def is_remote_control_present(item:item):
    symbol is_present=exists r: item : is_remote_control(r) and id[r] == id[item]
    return is_present
    
behavior observe_for_remote_control(area:item):
    body:
        observe(area, "Check if there is a remote control")

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists area: item : is_remote_control_present(area):
            bind area: item where:
                is_remote_control_present(area)
            achieve close_char(char, area) 
        else:
            foreach area: item:
                if not visited(area):
                    observe_for_remote_control(area)
